    request_id INT,
    request_type VARCHAR,

);

CREATE TABLE SLA_monitoring (
    sla_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

    agreement_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,

);

CREATE TABLE Escalation_prioritization (
    escalation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sla_id INT,
    priority_level INT,
    support_team VARCHAR(50),
    escalation_reason TEXT
);
